name: Solo Wanker
description: Your go-to for a party of one. Comes with 1 Medium Home Base Stroker and 1 pocket-ready premium wank buddy. Sleek. Discreet. Always up for a quickie. Perfect for those solo missions when the mood hits and the world can wait.

name: Common Man Wanker
description: Built for the everyday working man. Includes 1 Medium Home Base Stroker, 1 pocket-ready solo sidekick, and 1 travel-size wanker for, you know… emergencies. Reliable, versatile, and always down for a tug on the go.

name: Professional Wanker
description: For the seasoned stroker with taste. Comes with 1 Large Luxe Home Base Stroker, 2 pocket-ready solo slingers, 2 on-the-run quick-grip wankers, and 1 just-in-case ‘break glass in case of horny’ emergency wanker. The connoisseur’s kit. Smooth. Sophisticated. Stroke-tastic.
